title: 3.1 Master Challenge 2
question: A To-do list is a task management app that helps you stay organized and manage your daily tasks. With this app, you can make task lists, take notes, record collections, plan events, or set reminders. Create a list of features that you want in a To-do list.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
